attributes.action: relax the planning regulations applicable to Car Boot Sales and similar events and to recognise these events as an aid to a recycling strategy, and a means of fund raising for local charities and community groups.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, Car Boot Sales and similar events can only operate for 14 days a year on any one site under "permitted development" rules, unless planning consent is obtained.

I am proposing that the current rules be amended so that an event can be held for 6 hours per week, with an earliest start time of 8.30 am, without the need for planning permission, to allow a weekly event to be held.
